trans-unit.source: Each property of the SystemColors class is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a Windows display element.
trans-unit.target: SystemColors 類別的每個屬性都<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是 Windows 的色彩顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> or <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes> classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from SystemColors.
trans-unit.target: 使用的屬性達成更佳的效能<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens>或<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes>類別，而不是建立新的畫筆或筆刷根據 SystemColors 中的值。</xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a parameter value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will create a new brush.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要取得 3d 項目的表面色彩的筆刷，使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性因為它會取得筆刷的已經存在，而呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的參數值與<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>會建立新筆刷。</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是使用中視窗標題列背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是使用中視窗標題列的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是在使用中視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是使用中視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是應用程式 工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式工作區是文件未被佔用的多重文件檢視中的區域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是應用程式 工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是為 3d 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是為 3d 項目的醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目面對光源的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 3d 項目的陰影色彩的結構。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目面對光源的邊的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是為 3d 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 3d 項目的陰影色彩的結構。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目面對光源的邊的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 3d 項目的深色陰影色彩的結構。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目的色彩最深的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目深色陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the light color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是淺色 3d 項目。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目面對光源的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the light color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目的淺色。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是為 3d 項目的醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目色彩最亮的組件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是在 3d 項目中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是 3d 項目文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，桌面的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是在桌面的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是在使用中視窗標題列之色彩漸層最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是，最亮中作用中視窗標題列之色彩漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是在非作用中視窗標題列之色彩漸層最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是，最亮中非作用中視窗標題列之色彩漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是呈現暗灰色文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 清單中會停用的項目會以灰色文字顯示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是呈現暗灰色文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是選取的項目背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Drawing.Color>結構可能會使用清單方塊中選取項目的背景的色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是選取的項目背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是所選項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此色彩用於清單方塊中選取項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是所選項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，是用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
trans-unit.target: 單按一下熱追蹤項目執行的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of an inactive window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是作用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of an inactive window's border.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是作用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是作用中視窗標題列背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>也就是作用中視窗標題列背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是在非作用中視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是在非作用中視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是工具提示的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是工具提示的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是工具提示文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是工具提示文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a menu's background.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這表示功能表背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a menu's background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這表示功能表背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是功能表列背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是功能表列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，是用來醒目提示功能表項目時顯示為平面功能表的功能表的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是用來醒目提示功能表項目，功能表會顯示為平面功能表時色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a menu's text.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這表示功能表文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a menu's text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這表示功能表文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是捲軸的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是捲軸的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是視窗工作區中的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是視窗工作區中的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a window frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這表示視窗框架的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a window frame.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是視窗框架的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>結構，這是視窗工作區中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，這是視窗工作區中文字的色彩。
